document.full_text: china should guard against risks from "excessive" holdings of u.s. assets as washington could pursue a policy to weaken the dollar, a senior currency regulator said in comments published on a website that briefly pushed the dollar lower.
document.title: china official says u.s. could pursue weak dollar policy
lines_and_colors: china should guard against risks from "excessive" holdings of u.s. assets as washington could pursue a policy to weaken the dollar, a senior currency regulator said in comments published on a website that briefly pushed the dollar lower.
